name: path::<impl core::convert::From<&'a path::Path> for alloc_crate::borrow::Cow<'a, path::Path>>::from

path.path: std::path::<impl core::convert::From<&'a path::Path> for alloc_crate::borrow::Cow<'a, path::Path>>::from

doc:
Creates a clone-on-write pointer from a reference to
 [`Path`].

 This conversion does not clone or allocate.
